text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem pvk-outcome-cs

This code system http://nhn.no/fhir/nilar/CodeSystem/pvk-outcome-cs defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
Specific SpecificBlockA restriction exist for the actual health care provider, preventing access to all data for the person.
General GeneralBlockA restriction exist for all health care providers, preventing access to all data for the person.
Reservation ReservationThe person has a reservatioan against being recorded and hence no data is available.

name: PvkOutcome_CS
title: Pvk Outcome CS
description: A code that indicates how privacy settings (PVK) may have affected the outcome.

concept.definition: A restriction exist for the actual health care provider, preventing access to all data for the person.
A restriction exist for all health care providers, preventing access to all data for the person.
The person has a reservatioan against being recorded and hence no data is available.
